ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISNEW(), OR(Discount_1_PSF__c < 0 ,Discount_1_L__c < 0, Premium_Charges_Amount_1__c < 0, Discount_2_PSF__c < 0,Discount_2_L__c < 0, Discount_9_PSF__c <0, Discount_9_L__c <0, Discount_10_PSF__c <0, Discount_10_L__c <0, Discount_11_PSF__c <0,Discount_11_L__c <0, No_of_parking__c <0,Single_car_park_Additional__c < 0, Tandem_car_park_Additional__c<0,Single_Open_Additional__c < 0, Tandem_Open_Additional__c <0 ,Stack_Additional__c < 0, MLCP_Additional__c < 0,Basement_Additional__c < 0, Podium__c < 0, Single_Covered_Additional_Amount__c < 0, Tandem_Covered_Additional_Amount__c < 0,Single_Open_Additional_Amount__c<0, Tandem_Open_Additional_Amount__c < 0,Stilt_Additional_Amount__c <0, MLCP_Additional_Amount__c < 0 , Basement_Additional_Amount__c < 0, Podium_Amount__c < 0 ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Negative values are not allowed please contact the Sales Strategy.
